title: Something needs to be done about lack of player agency and top lane.
body:
Top lane's lack of impact on the game is getting out of hand. Playing every game on a hope and a prayer that your ADC and Mid don't feed is a miserable feeling. The game is so entirely team dependent that a single player's impact and agency is pretty much moot unless you can get the entire team to not feed. 4 people aren't enough. I understand teamwork is great to encourage, but your team should not immediately sink because of one person if everyone else is doing well.

We keep hearing there are changes to top lane and turrets have been mentioned, but these changes are moving at a snail's pace. Are we not going to see fixes until the season is over?
